title: Taken by the twins: A sorority hazing novella
description: When inexperienced Hannah joins the sorority Zeta Gamma Rho, she gets more than she has bargained forâ€”not one but two men. Sexy twins Tobias and Fabian are a package deal. The two godlike brothers introduce Hannah to carnal pleasures, stretch her holes, and dominate her into submission. Are you ready for this rough and hard novella?
author: Brooke Vestri
